LongDescription:
This screenshot tweak has superpowers! 
 Addilynne allows you to screenshot with ease! 
 This tweak is named after my niece! Hi Addi! 
 It utilizes nitoTV's screencapture utility without having to use the CLI! 
 AirDrops (thanks to screencapture/breezy) your screenshots to an available Mac or iOS device. 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Changelog: 
 Version 1.0 - Release. 
 Version 1.0.1-1 Shows a preview of the screenshot before AirDropping it.
